> "It takes courage to sail in uncharted waters"

<div class=topic>Contest</div>

In the gallery there are some pictures of the contest.

You can find the contest [here](https://codeforces.com/group/qWRAoRrTOT/contest/268759).

The statements in PDF can be found in [English](./files/class-10/statements-English.pdf) and in
[Spanish](./files/class-10/statements-Spanish.pdf).

The solutions are in [this blog](https://codeforces.com/group/qWRAoRrTOT/blog/entry/5475).

You need to be in the Codeforces Group to be able to see the contest and
solutions. Try joining the group or write us if you have problems joining it.
